title: UDL-Based Online Collaborative Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen online class design competencies for in-service secondary teachers collaborating with diverse learners. Operated in a BYOD environment, with summative assessments measuring program effectiveness

learning_goals: Online collaborative activities reflecting diverse learner needs can be designed by applying UDL principles.
Utilize digital collaboration tools to implement three or more effective feedback strategies with peer teachers
Apply a blended learning model combining online discussions and peer-teaching activities to actual curriculum contexts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
